description: This is a sample footer atom. It is used at the bottom of the page.
This is a sample footer sub-component.
This is a sample header atom. This component is meant to be placed at the top of the page.
This is a sample header atom sub-component.
This is a sample main section atom. Place the main content of the page inside of this component.
The badge component, prefixed by gds-badge, is a numerical indicator of associated items.
For a simple colored circle without a number inside, use an empty badge.

The button component, prefixed by .gds-button, is used to style <button> tags. Note that all optional classes may be used in combination with each other, for example on a single element with gds-button--success, gds-button--lg, & gds-button--block classes. To indicate that a button is disabled, use the disabled="disabled" HTML attribute.
This is a sample test molecule. It is used at the bottom of the page.

description: The avatar component, prefixed by .gds-avatar, can display a user's photo, a brand's logo, or a flag icon for internationalization. The avatar can include a dropdown menu, which is meant to be shown when the avatar is clicked on.
This is an example organism. It is a combination of atoms & molecules.

tags.description:
Margin top 3
Margin horizontal 2
Padding vertical 4
Padding all 1

description: Assign margin or padding to any element with shorthand utility classes. Includes support for individual properties, all properties, and vertical and horizontal properties. All classes are multiples of the global default value, the $unit variable. The classes are named using the format: {property}-{sides}-{size}.
